news_header: Democrats fear Kash Patel's FBI leadership will target Trump's opponents.
news_original_title: Trumpin kiistellyin virkanimitys ratkesi – FBI:n pääjohtaja Kash Patel levittää salaliittoteorioita ja listaa vihollisia
news_text: Democrats are concerned that Kash Patel, an ally of Trump and known for promoting conspiracy theories, will use his position as FBI head to persecute political opponents. Patel has a history of criticizing the FBI and has labeled many individuals, including Democrats and some Republicans, as part of a 'deep state' conspiracy. His recent book lists over 50 alleged conspirators, and he has vowed to reform the FBI, which he sees as corrupt. Critics worry that Patel's leadership will lead to a politically motivated crackdown on dissenters, further consolidating Trump's power.
